us.pserver.revok.http

Class HttpEntityFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.revok.http.HttpEntityFactory

  • public class HttpEntityFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for embed Http RPC info in the Http message body.
    Version:
    1.1 - 201506
    Author:
    Juno Roesler - juno@pserver.com
